title: Create a Sageveil Port
description: Create a new Sageveil port package with standard metadata, targets, and scaffolding.

name.description: Port name. Used for project directory and package name.

displayName.description: Human-friendly display name in package.json:sageveil.displayName. Defaults to the port name.

tags.description: Optional package.json:sageveil.tags values, e.g. terminal emulator.

templateFile.description: Template file name to create in src/lib/templates.
